梜字的基本解释

梜
jiā
木制的夹子。
筷子：“羹之有菜者，用梜；其无菜者，不用梜。”

梜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiā］
［《廣韻》古協切，入帖，見。］
(1)筷子。
(2)护书的夹板。亦指匣子。

梜字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梜； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页529第12
【唐韻】【正韻】?古協切，音頰。【說文】檢柙也。【廣韻】與筴同。猶箸也。【禮·曲禮】羹之有菜者用梜，其無菜者不用梜。【註】今人謂箸爲梜提。　又【廣韻】古狎切，音甲。木理亂。

梜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
梜字的起名意思

暂无。

梜
Basic explanation of words
梜
jiā
Wooden clothespin.
Chopsticks: "If the soup has vegetables, use 梜; if there are no vegetables, don't use 梜."
梜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiā］
["Guangyun" ancient association cut, enter the post, see. ]
(1) Chopsticks.
(2) The splint of the book guard. Also refers to the box.
梜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梜; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 529 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient Xie cut, sound cheek. [Said the text] Check it out. 【Guangyun】Same as 䇲. You chopsticks too. [Li·Chu Li] Those who have vegetables in the soup use 梜, and those who have no vegetables don't use 梜. [Note] Today, people call the chopsticks 梜Ti.　[Guangyun] Ancient 狎切, sound A. The wood is in chaos.
梜
